name: Back N´ Time
description:
A game made for the Major Jam #3

In Back N´Time, you have been connected to two computers, an old one and a modern one, to test B2N5T, a new technology that allows you to change between the two in a press of a button.

Try not to fall into the pit, get pulverized by a laser or die from pain from the terrible jokes the developers have wrote in this little platformer about friendship, love, death.

Credits:

IAmHappy - Pixel Art, Playtesting and a few sound effects. 

Markositta - Music and Sound Effects.

Me - Coding and Bad Jokes.

Note: Sorry there isn´t a HTML5 version. The game requires to be downloaded. It isn´t a long download, so we would appreciate it if you downloaded it. Thanks :D
